name: Mouse Game (Calle1122)
description:
The game is about a tiny mouse in a big world. You need to solve some small puzzles in the forest area to keep your friend from dying from hunger. The forest filled with danger  - enemies are sneaking around waiting for a chance to attack tiny mouse. So, hurry up!

This Game was made by Team 5:

Carl Lindstedt

Viktoriia Rudkovska

Filippa C Bjernevall

Christoffer Hermansson

Filip Lo

@FutureGames
